result.markdown: --- title: "Week 9: ARIMA models" --- ::: {.cell} ::: ## What you will learn this week * Seasonal ARIMA models * Computing forecasts for ARIMA models * ARIMA vs ETS models ## Pre-class activities Read [Sections 9.8-9.10 of the textbook](https://otexts.com/fpp3/arima.html) and watch all embedded videos ## Exercises (on your own or in tutorial) Complete Exercises 6-10 from [Section 9.11 of the book](https://otexts.com/fpp3/arima-exercises.html). ## Slides for seminar Download pdf ## Seminar activities For the Australian tourism data (from `tourism`): * Fit a suitable ARIMA model for all data. * Produce forecasts of your fitted models. * Check the forecasts for the "Snowy Mountains" and "Melbourne" regions. Do they look reasonable? ## Assignments * [Assignment 4](../assignments/A4.qmd) is due on Friday 03 May.
